name: copilot-ld
description: Intelligent chat agent built with GitHub Copilot and Linked Data
author: D. Olsson <hi@senzilla.io>

scripts.test: find extensions packages services test -name '*.test.js' | xargs node --test
scripts.test:watch: find extensions packages services test -name '*.test.js' | xargs node --test --watch
scripts.test:perf: find extensions packages services test -name '*.perf.js' | xargs node --test
scripts.check: npx spellchecker --quiet --files '**/*.md' '**/*.html' '!examples/**' '!**/*.prompt.md' --dictionaries .dictionary.txt --no-suggestions && npm run format && npm run lint
scripts.check:fix: npx spellchecker --quiet --files '**/*.md' '**/*.html' '!examples/**' '!**/*.prompt.md' --dictionaries .dictionary.txt --no-suggestions && npm run format:fix && npm run lint:fix
